segments.text: I'm calling to cancel a reservation I made earlier in the week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To cancel your reservation , I need your name , phone number , and date of trip , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Rudy Randolph , 818-555-1234 . My reservation begins on the second Monday of April .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see your reservation on my computer . Let me just cancel it , and you'll be all set !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I'll call again when things get better at home .
segments.speaker: S1
